--인덱스 추가시 WAM에 존재하는 컬럼 추가한다. INSERT INTO WAQ_DDL_TSF_IDX_COL( RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, RQST_DTL_SNO, DDL_IDX_COL_ID, DDL_IDX_COL_PNM, DDL_IDX_COL_LNM, RQST_DCD , DDL_IDX_ID, DDL_IDX_PNM, DDL_COL_ID, DDL_IDX_COL_ORD, SORT_TYP , OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID ) SELECT TI.RQST_NO, TI.RQST_SNO , (SELECT COALESCE(MAX(RQST_DTL_SNO), 0) FROM WAQ_DDL_TSF_IDX_COL WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno} ) + (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS RQST_DTL_SNO , A.DDL_IDX_COL_ID, A.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM, A.DDL_IDX_COL_LNM, 'CU' AS RQST_DCD , B.DDL_IDX_ID, B.DDL_IDX_PNM, A.DDL_COL_ID, A.DDL_IDX_COL_ORD, A.SORT_TYP , A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS, TI.FRS_RQST_DTM, TI.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, NOW(), TI.RQST_USER_ID FROM WAM_DDL_IDX_COL A INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_IDX B ON A.DDL_IDX_ID = B.DDL_IDX_ID INNER JOIN WAQ_DDL_TSF_IDX TI ON B.DDL_IDX_PNM = TI.DDL_IDX_PNM
WHERE TI.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND TI.RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno}
mapper.update: --요청구분 업데이트 UPDATE WAQ_DDL_TSF_IDX_COL A SET A.REG_TYP_CD = (select case when A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' then 'D' else case when MAX(B.DDL_IDX_COL_ID) IS NULL then 'C' else 'U' end end from WAM_DDL_TSF_IDX_COL B inner join WAM_DDL_TSF_IDX C on C.DDL_IDX_ID = B.DDL_IDX_ID and C.REG_TYP_CD in ('C','U') INNER JOIN WAQ_DDL_TSF_IDX D ON C.DDL_IDX_PNM = D.DDL_IDX_PNM AND C.TGT_DB_SCH_ID = D.TGT_DB_SCH_ID AND C.IDX_SPAC_ID = D.IDX_SPAC_ID where B.REG_TYP_CD in ('C','U') and B.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM = A.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM and D.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND D.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO ) ,A.VRF_CD = '4' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: --검증쿼리 : 변경사항 없을경우 (DTXC0) AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DDL_TSF_IDX D INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_TSF_IDX_COL E ON D.DDL_IDX_ID = E.DDL_IDX_ID INNER JOIN WAQ_DDL_TSF_IDX F ON F.DDL_IDX_PNM = D.DDL_IDX_PNM AND F.SRC_DB_SCH_ID = D.SRC_DB_SCH_ID AND F.TGT_DB_SCH_ID = D.TGT_DB_SCH_ID AND F.DDL_TBL_ID = D.DDL_TBL_ID AND F.IDX_SPAC_ID = D.IDX_SPAC_ID WHERE F.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND F.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND A.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM = E.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM AND A.DDL_IDX_COL_LNM = E.DDL_IDX_COL_LNM and COALESCE(A.DDL_IDX_COL_ORD , 0) = COALESCE(E.DDL_IDX_COL_ORD , 0) and COALESCE(A.DDL_COL_ID , '_') = COALESCE(E.DDL_COL_ID , '_') and COALESCE(A.SORT_TYP , '_') = COALESCE(E.SORT_TYP , '_') and COALESCE(A.OBJ_DESCN , '_') = COALESCE(E.OBJ_DESCN , '_') )
mapper.update: --결재시각 업데이트... UPDATE WAQ_DDL_TSF_IDX_COL X SET (APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID) = ( SELECT NOW(), A.APRV_USER_ID FROM WAQ_DDL_TSF_IDX A WHERE A.RQST_NO = X.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = X.RQST_SNO AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인대상만... ) WHERE X.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND X.VRF_CD = '1' --등록가능

--WAQ ID, VERS 등을 업데이트... UPDATE WAQ_DDL_TSF_IDX_COL A SET (DDL_IDX_COL_ID, DDL_IDX_ID, OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID) = ( SELECT D.DDL_IDX_COL_ID , C.DDL_IDX_ID , COALESCE(D.OBJ_VERS, 0) + 1 AS OBJ_VERS , D.FRS_RQST_DTM , D.FRS_RQST_USER_ID FROM WAQ_DDL_TSF_IDX B INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_TSF_IDX C ON B.DDL_IDX_PNM = C.DDL_IDX_PNM AND B.SRC_DB_SCH_ID = C.SRC_DB_SCH_ID AND B.TGT_DB_SCH_ID = C.TGT_DB_SCH_ID AND B.DDL_TBL_ID = C.DDL_TBL_ID AND B.IDX_SPAC_ID = C.IDX_SPAC_ID INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_TSF_IDX_COL D ON C.DDL_IDX_ID = D.DDL_IDX_ID WHERE B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND D.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM = A.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM AND D.DDL_IDX_COL_LNM = A.DDL_IDX_COL_LNM AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인대상만... ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.VRF_CD = '1' --등록가능 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DDL_TSF_IDX B JOIN WAM_DDL_TSF_IDX C ON B.DDL_IDX_PNM = C.DDL_IDX_PNM AND B.SRC_DB_SCH_ID = C.SRC_DB_SCH_ID AND B.TGT_DB_SCH_ID = C.TGT_DB_SCH_ID AND B.DDL_TBL_ID = C.DDL_TBL_ID AND B.IDX_SPAC_ID = C.IDX_SPAC_ID JOIN WAM_DDL_TSF_IDX_COL D ON C.DDL_IDX_ID = D.DDL_IDX_ID WHERE B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND D.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM = A.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM AND D.DDL_IDX_COL_LNM = A.DDL_IDX_COL_LNM AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인대상만... )

mapper.delete: --WAM 삭제 (등록유형코드가REG_TYP_CD 변경, 삭제일 경우) DELETE FROM WAM_DDL_TSF_IDX_COL A WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DDL_TSF_IDX B JOIN WAM_DDL_TSF_IDX D ON B.DDL_IDX_ID = D.DDL_IDX_ID JOIN WAQ_DDL_TSF_IDX_COL C ON B.RQST_NO = C.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = C.RQST_SNO WHERE C.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND D.DDL_IDX_ID = A.DDL_IDX_ID AND C.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM = A.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM AND C.DDL_IDX_COL_LNM = A.DDL_IDX_COL_LNM AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND C.VRF_CD = '1' )
mapper.insert: --WAM 추가 (WAQ 내용을 추가, REG_TYP_CD 가 신규,변경일 경우) INSERT INTO WAM_DDL_TSF_IDX_COL SELECT A.DDL_IDX_COL_ID , FROM WAQ_DDL_TSF_IDX_COL A JOIN WAQ_DDL_TSF_IDX B ON A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.VRF_CD = '1' AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1'
mapper.update: --WAH 이력 만료... UPDATE WAH_DDL_TSF_IDX_COL A SET EXP_DTM = NOW() WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DDL_TSF_IDX B JOIN WAQ_DDL_TSF_IDX_COL C ON B.RQST_NO = C.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = C.RQST_SNO WHERE C.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND C.DDL_IDX_ID = A.DDL_IDX_ID AND C.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM = A.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM AND C.DDL_IDX_COL_LNM = A.DDL_IDX_COL_LNM AND C.VRF_CD = '1' AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' ) AND EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.insert: --WAH이력 적재... INSERT INTO WAH_DDL_TSF_IDX_COL SELECT A.DDL_IDX_COL_ID , TO_DATE( '9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EXP_DTM , NOW() AS STR_DTM , FROM WAQ_DDL_TSF_IDX_COL A JOIN WAQ_DDL_TSF_IDX B ON B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.VRF_CD = '1' AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1'

SELECT A.* , B.DDL_IDX_PNM , B.DDL_IDX_LNM , C.DDL_TBL_PNM , C.DDL_TBL_LNM , U.USER_NM AS FRS_RQST_USER_NM , U1.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM , U2.USER_NM AS APRV_USER_NM FROM WAM_DDL_TSF_IDX_COL A INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_TSF_IDX B ON A.DDL_IDX_ID = B.DDL_IDX_ID AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_TBL C ON B.DDL_TBL_ID = C.DDL_TBL_ID AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND U.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U1 ON A.RQST_USER_ID = U1.USER_ID AND U1.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND U1.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U2 ON A.APRV_USER_ID = U2.USER_ID AND U2.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND U2.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
